text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggireyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggireyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 75. Should any bhikkhu, angered and displeased, raise the palm of his hand against (another) bhikkhu, it is to be confessed.
๗๕. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใด โกรธน้อยใจเงื้อหอกคือฝ่ามือขึ้นแก่ภิกษุ เป็นปาจิตตีย์
75. Should any bhikkhu, being angry and displeased, raise his hand against a bhikkhu, it entails expiation.
